## addAuthoringLayoutMappingIfNonExistentAction variable

Adds this content item to the store only if the item does not exist, yet. If the item does not exist, this triggers a [addAuthoringLayoutMappingAction](./redux-feature-auth-layout-mapping.addauthoringlayoutmappingaction.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
addAuthoringLayoutMappingIfNonExistentAction: UnaryFunction<AuthoringLayoutMapping, AddAuthoringLayoutMappingIfNonExistentAction>
```
